snippet: News of the arrest came less than an hour after police officials publicly identified the suspect, Daniel St. Hubert, in the stabbing of two children, one fatally, in Brooklyn.
abstract: Daniel St Hubert is arrested in connection with stabbings of 6-year-old Prince Joshua Avitto and 7-year-old Mikayla Capers in Brooklyn, which left Avitto dead and Capers critically wounded; Hubert has extensive criminal record and was released from prison less than two weeks before stabbings after serving sentence for attempted murder.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Joseph Goldstein, Nate Schweber, Ashley Southall and John Surico.

lead_paragraph: News of the arrest came less than an hour after police officials publicly identified the suspect, Daniel St. Hubert, in the stabbing of two children, one fatally, in Brooklyn.

headline.main: Ex-Convict Arrested in Stabbing of Brooklyn Children
headline.print_headline: Ex-Convict Arrested in Stabbing of Brooklyn Children
